verses.verse: Not <S%H3808><s%> unto us, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> unto us, but <S%H3588><s%> unto thy name <S%H8034><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> glory, <S%H3519><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> thy mercy, <S%H2617><s%> and for <S%H5921><s%> thy truth's <S%H571><s%> sake.
Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> should the heathen <S%H1471><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> Where <S%H346><s%> is now <S%H4994><s%> their God? <S%H430><s%>
But our God <S%H430><s%> is in the heavens: <S%H8064><s%> he hath done <S%H6213><s%> whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> he hath pleased. <S%H2654><s%>
Their idols <S%H6091><s%> are silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of men's <S%H120><s%> hands. <S%H3027><s%>
They have mouths, <S%H6310><s%> but they speak <S%H1696><s%> not: <S%H3808><s%> eyes <S%H5869><s%> have they, but they see <S%H7200><s%> not: <S%H3808><s%>
They have ears, <S%H241><s%> but they hear <S%H8085><s%> not: <S%H3808><s%> noses <S%H639><s%> have they, but they smell <S%H7306><s%> not: <S%H3808><s%>

They have hands, <S%H3027><s%> but they handle <S%H4184><s%> not: <S%H3808><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%> have they, but they walk <S%H1980><s%> not: <S%H3808><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> speak <S%H1897><s%> they through their throat. <S%H1627><s%>
They that make <S%H6213><s%> them are <S%H1961><s%> like unto them; <S%H3644><s%> so is every one <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> trusteth <S%H982><s%> in them.
O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> trust <S%H982><s%> thou in the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is their help <S%H5828><s%> and their shield. <S%H4043><s%>
O house <S%H1004><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> trust <S%H982><s%> in the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is their help <S%H5828><s%> and their shield. <S%H4043><s%>
Ye that fear <S%H3373><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> trust <S%H982><s%> in the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is their help <S%H5828><s%> and their shield. <S%H4043><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath been mindful <S%H2142><s%> of us: he will bless <S%H1288><s%> us; he will bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H853><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> he will bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H853><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Aaron. <S%H175><s%>
He will bless <S%H1288><s%> them that fear <S%H3373><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> both small <S%H6996><s%> and <S%H5973><s%> great. <S%H1419><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall increase you more and more, <S%H3254><s%> <S%H5921><s%> you and your children. <S%H1121><s%>
Ye <S%H859><s%> are blessed <S%H1288><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> which made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth. <S%H776><s%>
The heaven, <S%H8064><s%> even the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> are the LORD's: <S%H3068><s%> but the earth <S%H776><s%> hath he given <S%H5414><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>
The dead <S%H4191><s%> praise <S%H1984><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> the LORD, <S%H3050><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> that go down <S%H3381><s%> into silence. <S%H1745><s%>

But we <S%H587><s%> will bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD <S%H3050><s%> from this time forth <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6258><s%> and forevermore. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> the LORD. <S%H3050><s%>
